00023 #define HYPERTABLE_HANDLERMAP_H

00025 #include <cassert>

00027 //#define HT_DISABLE_LOG_DEBUG

00031 #include "Common/Mutex.h"

00038 #include "IOHandlerData.h"
00039 #include "IOHandlerDatagram.h"

00041 namespace Hypertable {
00042 
00043   class HandlerMap : public ReferenceCount {
00044 
00045   public:
00046 
00047     void insert_handler(IOHandler *handler) {
00048       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00049       assert(m_handler_map.find(handler->get_address()) == m_handler_map.end());
00050       m_handler_map[handler->get_address()] = handler;
00051     }
00052 
00053     int set_alias(const sockaddr_in &addr, const sockaddr_in &alias) {
00054       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00055       SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>::iterator iter;
00056 
00057       if (m_handler_map.find(alias) != m_handler_map.end())
00058         return Error::COMM_CONFLICTING_ADDRESS;
00059 
00060       if ((iter = m_handler_map.find(addr)) == m_handler_map.end())
00061         return Error::COMM_NOT_CONNECTED;
00062 
00063       (*iter).second->set_alias(alias);
00064       m_handler_map[alias] = (*iter).second;
00065 
00066       return Error::OK;
00067     }
00068 
00069     bool contains_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00070       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00071       return lookup_handler(addr);
00072     }
00073 
00074     bool lookup_data_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00075                              IOHandlerDataPtr &io_handler_data) {
00076       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00077       IOHandler *handler = lookup_handler(addr);
00078       if (handler) {
00079         io_handler_data = dynamic_cast<IOHandlerData *>(handler);
00080         if (io_handler_data)
00081           return true;
00082       }
00083       return false;
00084     }
00085 
00086     void insert_datagram_handler(IOHandler *handler) {
00087       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00088       HT_ASSERT(m_datagram_handler_map.find(handler->get_local_address())
00089                 == m_datagram_handler_map.end());
00090       m_datagram_handler_map[handler->get_local_address()] = handler;
00091     }
00092 
00093     bool lookup_datagram_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr,
00094                                  IOHandlerDatagramPtr &io_handler_dg) {
00095       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00096       SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>::iterator iter =
00097           m_datagram_handler_map.find(addr);
00098 
00099       if (iter == m_handler_map.end())
00100         return false;
00101 
00102       io_handler_dg = (IOHandlerDatagram *)(*iter).second.get();
00103 
00104       return true;
00105     }
00106 
00107     bool remove_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr, IOHandlerPtr &handler) {
00108       SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>::iterator iter;
00109 
00110       if ((iter = m_handler_map.find(addr)) != m_handler_map.end()) {
00111         handler = (*iter).second;
00112         m_handler_map.erase(iter);
00113         struct sockaddr_in alias;
00114         handler->get_alias(&alias);
00115 
00116         if (alias.sin_port != 0) {
00117           if ((iter = m_handler_map.find(alias)) != m_handler_map.end())
00118             m_handler_map.erase(iter);
00119           else {
00120             HT_ERRORF("Unable to find mapping for alias (%s) in HandlerMap",
00121                       InetAddr::format(alias).c_str());
00122           }
00123         }
00124       }
00125       else if ((iter = m_datagram_handler_map.find(addr))
00126                 != m_datagram_handler_map.end()) {
00127         handler = (*iter).second;
00128         m_datagram_handler_map.erase(iter);
00129       }
00130       else
00131         return false;
00132       return true;
00133     }
00134 
00135     bool decomission_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr, IOHandlerPtr &handler) {
00136       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00137 
00138       if (remove_handler(addr, handler)) {
00139         m_decomissioned_handlers.insert(handler);
00140         return true;
00141       }
00142       return false;
00143     }
00144 
00145     bool decomission_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00146       IOHandlerPtr handler;
00147       return decomission_handler(addr, handler);
00148     }
00149 
00150     void purge_handler(IOHandler *handler) {
00151       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00152       m_decomissioned_handlers.erase(handler);
00153       if (m_decomissioned_handlers.empty())
00154         m_cond.notify_all();
00155     }
00156 
00157     void decomission_all(std::set<IOHandler *> &handlers) {
00158       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00159       SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>::iterator iter;
00160 
00161       // TCP handlers
00162       for (iter = m_handler_map.begin(); iter != m_handler_map.end(); ++iter) {
00163         m_decomissioned_handlers.insert((*iter).second);
00164         handlers.insert((*iter).second.get());
00165       }
00166       m_handler_map.clear();
00167 
00168       // UDP handlers
00169       for (iter = m_datagram_handler_map.begin();
00170            iter != m_datagram_handler_map.end(); ++iter) {
00171         m_decomissioned_handlers.insert((*iter).second);
00172         handlers.insert((*iter).second.get());
00173       }
00174       m_datagram_handler_map.clear();
00175     }
00176 
00177     void wait_for_empty() {
00178       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00179       if (!m_decomissioned_handlers.empty())
00180         m_cond.wait(lock);
00181     }
00182 
00183   private:
00184 
00185     IOHandler *lookup_handler(const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00186       SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>::iterator iter = m_handler_map.find(addr);
00187       if (iter == m_handler_map.end())
00188         return 0;
00189       return (*iter).second.get();
00190     }
00191 
00192     Mutex                      m_mutex;
00193     boost::condition           m_cond;
00194     SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>  m_handler_map;
00195     SockAddrMap<IOHandlerPtr>  m_datagram_handler_map;
00196     std::set<IOHandlerPtr, ltiohp>  m_decomissioned_handlers;
00197   };
00198   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<HandlerMap> HandlerMapPtr;
00199 
00200 }

00203 #endif // HYPERTABLE_HANDLERMAP_H
